cards.title: 简介
cards.body: 本备忘单旨在快速理解 [redis](https://redis.io/) 所涉及的主要概念，提供了最常用的SQL语句，供您参考。

cards.title: 介绍
cards.body: Redis 是一个 `key-value` 存储系统类似 Memcached

cards.title: 介绍
cards.body:
• 它支持存储的 value 类型相对更多，包括string(字符串)、list(链表)、set(集合)、zset(sorted set 有序集合)和hash(哈希类型)
• 数据类型都支持 push/pop、add/remove 及取交集并集和差集及更丰富的操作

cards.title: 介绍
cards.code: $ redis-server &

cards.title: 介绍
cards.body: 使用 CLI 登陆 redis

cards.title: 介绍
cards.code: $ redis-cli

cards.title: 介绍
cards.body: 使用 Telnet 的登陆 redis

cards.title: 小试
cards.code:
redis> PING
PONG

cards.title: 小试
cards.code:
redis> SET mykey "Hello world"
OK
redis> GET mykey
"Hello world"

cards.title: 数据类型
cards.body:
• [Strings(字符串)](#redis-字符串类型设置)
• [Lists(列表)](#redis-列表类型设置)
• [Hashes(哈希)](#redis-哈希类型设置)
• [Sets(集合)](#redis-集合类型设置)
• [Sorted Sets(有序集合)](#redis-排序集类型设置)

cards.title: COMMAND
cards.body: 获取 Redis 命令详细信息的数组

cards.title: 一些引用(可能有帮助)
cards.body:
:- | -- :- | -- [ACL LOAD](https://redis.io/commands/acl-load) | 从配置的 ACL 文件重新加载 ACL [ACL SAVE](https://redis.io/commands/acl-save) | 将当前的 ACL 规则保存在配置的 ACL 文件中 [ACL LIST](https://redis.io/commands/acl-list) | 以 ACL 配置文件格式列出当前的 ACL 规则 [ACL USERS](https://redis.io/commands/acl-users) | 列出所有配置的ACL规则的用户名 [ACL GETUSER](https://redis.io/commands/acl-getuser) | 获取特定 ACL 用户的规则 [ACL SETUSER](https://redis.io/commands/acl-setuser) | 修改或创建特定 ACL 用户的规则 [ACL DELUSER](https://redis.io/commands/acl-deluser) | 删除指定的 ACL 用户和关联的规则 [ACL CAT](https://redis.io/commands/acl-cat) | 列出 ACL 类别或类别内的命令 [ACL GENPASS](https://redis.io/commands/acl-genpass) | 生成用于 ACL 用户的伪随机安全密码 [ACL WHOAMI](https://redis.io/commands/acl-whoami) | 返回关联到当前连接的用户的名称 [ACL LOG](https://redis.io/commands/acl-log) | 列出由于 ACL 到位而被拒绝的最新事件 [ACL HELP](https://redis.io/commands/acl-help) | 显示有关ACL访问控制的帮助信息 [BGREWRITEAOF](https://redis.io/commands/bgrewriteaof) | 异步重写 append-only 文件 [BGSAVE](https://redis.io/commands/bgsave) | 将数据集异步保存到磁盘 [CONFIG GET](https://redis.io/commands/config-get) | 获取配置参数的值 [CONFIG REWRITE](https://redis.io/commands/config-rewrite) | 用内存中的配置重写配置文件 [CONFIG SET](https://redis.io/commands/config-set) | 将配置参数设置为给定值 [CONFIG RESETSTAT](https://redis.io/commands/config-resetstat) | 重置 INFO 返回的统计数据 [DBSIZE](https://redis.io/commands/dbsize) | 返回所选数据库中的键数 [DEBUG OBJECT](https://redis.io/commands/debug-object) | 获取某个key的调试信息 [DEBUG SEGFAULT](https://redis.io/commands/debug-segfault) | 使服务器崩溃 [FLUSHALL](https://redis.io/commands/flushall) | 从所有数据库中删除所有密钥 [FLUSHDB](https://redis.io/commands/flushdb) | 从当前数据库中删除所有键 [LOLWUT](https://redis.io/commands/lolwut) | 显示一些计算机信息和 Redis 版本 [LASTSAVE](https://redis.io/commands/lastsave) | 获取上次成功保存到磁盘的 UNIX 时间戳 [MEMORY DOCTOR](https://redis.io/commands/memory-doctor) | 输出内存问题报告 [MEMORY HELP](https://redis.io/commands/memory-help) | 显示有关内存的使用帮助 [MEMORY MALLOC-STATS](https://redis.io/commands/memory-malloc-stats) | 显示分配器内部统计 [MEMORY PURGE](https://redis.io/commands/memory-purge) | 要求分配器释放内存 [MEMORY STATS](https://redis.io/commands/memory-stats) | 显示内存使用详情(该死，运维的我经常用到) [MEMORY USAGE](https://redis.io/commands/memory-usage) | 估计一个键的内存使用 [MODULE LIST](https://redis.io/commands/module-list) | 列出服务器加载的所有模块 [MODULE LOAD](https://redis.io/commands/module-load) | 加载模块 [MODULE UNLOAD](https://redis.io/commands/module-unload) | 卸载模块 [MONITOR](https://redis.io/commands/monitor) | 实时监听服务器收到的所有请求 [SAVE](https://redis.io/commands/save) | 将数据集同步保存到磁盘 [SHUTDOWN](https://redis.io/commands/shutdown) | 将数据集同步保存到磁盘，然后关闭服务器 [~~SLAVEOF~~](https://redis.io/commands/slaveof) | 使服务器成为另一个实例的副本，或将其提升为主服务器
_(从Redis 5开始弃用，改成 `REPLICAOF`了)_ [REPLICAOF](https://redis.io/commands/replicaof) | 使服务器成为另一个实例的副本，或将其提升为主服务器 [SLOWLOG](https://redis.io/commands/slowlog) | 管理 Redis 慢查询日志 [SWAPDB](https://redis.io/commands/swapdb) | 交换两个Redis数据库 [SYNC](https://redis.io/commands/sync) | 用于复制的内部命令(主) [PSYNC](https://redis.io/commands/psync) | 用于复制的内部命令(备) [LATENCY DOCTOR](https://redis.io/commands/latency-doctor) | 返回人类可读的延迟分析报告 [LATENCY GRAPH](https://redis.io/commands/latency-graph) | 返回事件的延迟图 [LATENCY HISTORY](https://redis.io/commands/latency-history) | 返回事件的时间戳延迟样本 [LATENCY LATEST](https://redis.io/commands/latency-latest) | 返回所有事件的最新延迟样本 [LATENCY RESET](https://redis.io/commands/latency-reset) | 重置一个或多个事件的延迟数据 [LATENCY HELP](https://redis.io/commands/latency-help) | 显示有关不同子命令的有用文本

cards.title: COMMAND COUNT
cards.code: COMMAND COUNT

cards.title: COMMAND COUNT
cards.code:
redis> COMMAND COUNT
(integer) 217

cards.title: COMMAND COUNT
cards.body: 获取 Redis 命令总数

cards.title: COMMAND GETKEYS
cards.code: COMMAND GETKEYS

cards.title: COMMAND GETKEYS
cards.code:
redis> COMMAND GETKEYS MSET a b c d e f
1) "a"
2) "c"
3) "e"
redis> COMMAND GETKEYS EVAL "not consulted" 3 key1 key2 key3 arg1 arg2 arg3 argN
1) "key1"
2) "key2"
3) "key3"
redis> COMMAND GETKEYS SORT mylist ALPHA STORE outlist
1) "mylist"
2) "outlist"

cards.title: COMMAND GETKEYS
cards.body: 给定完整的 Redis 命令提取密钥

cards.title: COMMAND INFO

cards.code:
redis> COMMAND INFO get set eval
1) 1) "get"
   2) (integer) 2
   3) 1) "readonly"
      2) "fast"
   4) (integer) 1
   5) (integer) 1
   6) (integer) 1
   7) 1) "@read"
      2) "@string"
      3) "@fast"
2) 1) "set"
   2) (integer) -3
   3) 1) "write"
      2) "denyoom"
   4) (integer) 1
   5) (integer) 1
   6) (integer) 1
   7) 1) "@write"
      2) "@string"
      3) "@slow"
3) 1) "eval"
   2) (integer) -3
   3) 1) "noscript"
      2) "movablekeys"
   4) (integer) 0
   5) (integer) 0
   6) (integer) 0
   7) 1) "@slow"
      2) "@scripting"

cards.title: 一些引用(可能有帮助)
cards.body:
:- | --
:- | --
[COPY](https://redis.io/commands/copy)       | 复制键值对
[MIGRATE](https://redis.io/commands/migrate) | 以原子方式将键值对从 Redis 实例传输到另一个实例
[MOVE](https://redis.io/commands/move)       | 将键值对移动到另一个数据库
[OBJECT](https://redis.io/commands/object)   | 检查 Redis 对象的内部结构
[RESTORE](https://redis.io/commands/restore) | 使用提供的序列化值创建键值对，之前使用 DUMP 获得
[SORT](https://redis.io/commands/sort)       | 对列表、集合或有序集合中的元素进行排序
[WAIT](https://redis.io/commands/wait)       | 等待在当前连接的上下文中发送的所有写命令的同步复制
[SCAN](https://redis.io/commands/scan)       | 增量迭代键空间

cards.title: DEL
cards.code: DEL key [key ...]

cards.title: DEL
cards.code:
redis> SET key1 "Hello"
"OK"
redis> SET key2 "World"
"OK"
redis> DEL key1 key2 key3
(integer) 2

cards.title: DUMP
cards.code: DUMP key

cards.title: DUMP
cards.code:
redis> SET mykey 10
"OK"
redis> DUMP mykey
"\u0000\xC0\n\t\u0000\xBEm\u0006\x89Z(\u0000\n"

cards.title: DUMP
cards.body: 返回存储在指定键中的值的序列化版本

cards.title: EXISTS
cards.code: EXISTS key [key ...]

cards.title: EXISTS
cards.code:
redis> SET key1 "Hello"
"OK"
redis> EXISTS key1
(integer) 1
redis> EXISTS nosuchkey
(integer) 0
redis> SET key2 "World"
"OK"
redis> EXISTS key1 key2 nosuchkey
(integer) 2

cards.title: EXPIRE
cards.code: EXPIRE key seconds

cards.title: EXPIRE
cards.code:
redis> SET mykey "Hello"
"OK"
redis> EXPIRE mykey 10
(integer) 1
redis> TTL mykey
(integer) 10
redis> SET mykey "Hello World"
"OK"
redis> TTL mykey
(integer) -1

cards.title: EXPIRE
cards.body: 设置键值对的生存时间(以秒为单位)

cards.title: EXPIREAT
cards.code: EXPIREAT key timestamp

cards.title: EXPIREAT
cards.code:
redis> SET mykey "Hello"
"OK"
redis> EXISTS mykey
(integer) 1
redis> EXPIREAT mykey 1293840000
(integer) 1
redis> EXISTS mykey
(integer) 0

cards.title: EXPIREAT
cards.body: 将键值对的到期时间设置为 UNIX 时间戳

cards.title: KEYS
cards.code: KEYS pattern

cards.title: KEYS
cards.code:
redis> MSET firstname Jack lastname Stuntman age 35
"OK"
redis> KEYS *name*
1) "firstname"
2) "lastname"
redis> KEYS a??
1) "age"
redis> KEYS *
1) "firstname"
2) "age"
3) "lastname"

cards.title: KEYS
cards.body: 查找与给定模式匹配的所有键

cards.title: PERSIST
cards.code: PERSIST key

cards.title: PERSIST
cards.code:
redis> SET mykey "Hello"
"OK"
redis> EXPIRE mykey 10
(integer) 1
redis> TTL mykey
(integer) 10
redis> PERSIST mykey
(integer) 1
redis> TTL mykey
(integer) -1

cards.title: PERSIST
cards.body: 从键值对中删除过期时间

cards.title: PEXPIRE
cards.code: PEXPIRE key milliseconds

cards.title: PEXPIRE
cards.code:
redis> SET mykey "Hello"
"OK"
redis> PEXPIRE mykey 1500
(integer) 1
redis> TTL mykey
(integer) 1
redis> PTTL mykey
(integer) 1499

cards.title: PEXPIRE
cards.body: 设置键的生存时间(以毫秒为单位)

cards.title: PEXPIREAT
cards.code: PEXPIREAT key milliseconds-timestamp

cards.title: PEXPIREAT
cards.code:
redis> SET mykey "Hello"
"OK"
redis> PEXPIREAT mykey 1555555555005
(integer) 1
redis> TTL mykey
(integer) -2
redis> PTTL mykey
(integer) -2

cards.title: PEXPIREAT
cards.body: 将键值对的到期时间设置为以毫秒为单位指定的 UNIX 时间戳

cards.title: PTTL
cards.code: PTTL key

cards.title: PTTL
cards.code:
redis> SET mykey "Hello"
"OK"
redis> EXPIRE mykey 1
(integer) 1
redis> PTTL mykey
(integer) 1000

cards.title: PTTL
cards.body: 以毫秒为单位获取键值对的生存时间

cards.title: RENAME
cards.code: RENAME key newkey

cards.title: RENAME
cards.code:
redis> SET mykey "Hello"
"OK"
redis> RENAME mykey myotherkey
"OK"
redis> GET myotherkey
"Hello"

cards.title: RENAMENX
cards.code: RENAMENX key newkey

cards.title: RENAMENX
cards.code:
redis> SET mykey "Hello"
"OK"
redis> SET myotherkey "World"
"OK"
redis> RENAMENX mykey myotherkey
(integer) 0
redis> GET myotherkey
"World"

cards.title: RENAMENX
cards.body: 重命名键值对，仅当新键值对不存在时

cards.title: TOUCH
cards.code: TOUCH key [key ...]

cards.title: TOUCH
cards.code:
redis> SET key1 "Hello"
"OK"
redis> SET key2 "World"
"OK"
redis> TOUCH key1 key2
(integer) 2

cards.title: TOUCH
cards.body: 更改键值对的最后访问时间。返回指定的现有键的数量

cards.title: TTL
cards.code: TTL key

cards.title: TTL
cards.code:
redis> SET mykey "Hello"
"OK"
redis> EXPIRE mykey 10
(integer) 1
redis> TTL mykey
(integer) 10

cards.title: TTL
cards.body: 获得一个键的值的时间(有点绕口，但意思是对的)

cards.title: TYPE
cards.code: TYPE key

cards.title: TYPE
cards.code:
redis> SET key1 "value"
"OK"
redis> LPUSH key2 "value"
(integer) 1
redis> SADD key3 "value"
(integer) 1
redis> TYPE key1
"string"
redis> TYPE key2
"list"
redis> TYPE key3
"set"

cards.title: TYPE
cards.body: 确定存储在键中的类型

cards.title: UNLINK
cards.code: UNLINK key [key ...]

cards.title: UNLINK
cards.code:
redis> SET key1 "Hello"
"OK"
redis> SET key2 "World"
"OK"
redis> UNLINK key1 key2 key3
(integer) 2

cards.title: UNLINK
cards.body: 在另一个线程中异步删除一个键。否则它就像 DEL，但不是阻塞的

cards.title: 一些引用(可能有帮助)
cards.body:
:- | --
:- | --
[AUTH](https://redis.io/commands/auth)                       | 向服务器进行身份验证
[CLIENT CACHING](https://redis.io/commands/client-caching)   | 指示服务器在下一个请求中是否跟踪键
[CLIENT KILL](https://redis.io/commands/client-kill)         | 终止客户端的连接
[CLIENT LIST](https://redis.io/commands/client-list)         | 获取客户端连接列表
[CLIENT GETNAME](https://redis.io/commands/client-getname)    | 获取当前连接名称
[CLIENT GETREDIR](https://redis.io/commands/client-getredir)  | 获取跟踪通知重定向客户端 ID(如果有)
[CLIENT PAUSE](https://redis.io/commands/client-pause)       | 停止处理来自客户端的命令一段时间
[CLIENT REPLY](https://redis.io/commands/client-reply)       | 指示服务器是否回复命令
[CLIENT SETNAME](https://redis.io/commands/client-setname)   | 设置当前连接名称
[CLIENT TRACKING](https://redis.io/commands/client-tracking) | 启用或禁用服务器辅助客户端缓存支持
[CLIENT UNBLOCK](https://redis.io/commands/client-unblock)   | 取消阻止来自不同连接的阻塞命令中阻塞的客户端
[HELLO](https://redis.io/commands/hello)                     | 切换Redis协议
[QUIT](https://redis.io/commands/quit)                        | 关闭连接
[RESET](https://redis.io/commands/reset)                      | 重置连接
[SELECT](https://redis.io/commands/select)                   | 更改为当前连接选择的数据库

cards.title: CLIENT ID
cards.code: CLIENT ID

cards.title: CLIENT ID
cards.code:
redis> CLIENT ID
ERR Unknown or disabled command 'CLIENT'

cards.title: CLIENT ID
cards.body: 返回当前连接的客户端 ID

cards.title: CLIENT INFO
cards.code: CLIENT INFO

cards.title: CLIENT INFO
cards.code:
redis> CLIENT INFO
"id=55542 addr=127.0.0.1:58710 laddr=127.0.0.1:6379 fd=8 name= age=114920 idle=0 flags=N db=0 sub=0 psub=0 multi=-1 qbuf=26 qbuf-free=40928 argv-mem=10 obl=0 oll=0 omem=0 tot-mem=61466 events=r cmd=client user=default redir=-1\n"

cards.title: CLIENT INFO
cards.body: 返回有关当前客户端连接的信息。

cards.title: ECHO
cards.code: ECHO message

cards.title: ECHO
cards.code:
redis> ECHO "Hello World!"
"Hello World!"

cards.title: PING
cards.code: PING [message]

cards.title: PING
cards.code:
redis> PING
"PONG"
redis> PING "hello world"
"hello world"

cards.title: APPEND
cards.code: APPEND key value

cards.title: APPEND
cards.code:
redis> EXISTS mykey
(integer) 0
redis> APPEND mykey "Hello"
(integer) 5
redis> APPEND mykey " World"
(integer) 11
redis> GET mykey
"Hello World"

cards.title: APPEND
cards.body: 将值附加到键,可以理解为追加作用

cards.title: BITCOUNT
cards.code: BITCOUNT key [start end]

cards.title: BITCOUNT
cards.code:
redis> SET mykey "foobar"
"OK"
redis> BITCOUNT mykey
(integer) 26
redis> BITCOUNT mykey 0 0
(integer) 4
redis> BITCOUNT mykey 1 1
(integer) 6

cards.title: BITCOUNT
cards.body: 计算字符串中的集合位

cards.title: BITFIELD
cards.code:
BITFIELD key [GET type offset] [SET type offset value] 
[INCRBY type offset increment] [OVERFLOW WRAP|SAT|FAIL]

cards.title: BITFIELD
cards.code:
redis> BITFIELD mykey INCRBY i5 100 1 GET u4 0
1) (integer) 1
2) (integer) 0

cards.title: BITFIELD
cards.body: 对字符串执行任意位域整数运算

cards.title: BITOP
cards.code: BITOP operation destkey key [key ...]

cards.title: BITOP
cards.code:
redis> SET key1 "foobar"
"OK"
redis> SET key2 "abcdef"
"OK"
redis> BITOP AND dest key1 key2
(integer) 6
redis> GET dest
"`bc`ab"

cards.title: BITOP
cards.body: 在字符串之间执行按位运算

cards.title: BITPOS
cards.code: BITPOS key bit [start] [end]

cards.title: BITPOS
cards.code:
redis> SET mykey "\xff\xf0\x00"
"OK"
redis> BITPOS mykey 0
(integer) 12
redis> SET mykey "\x00\xff\xf0"
"OK"
redis> BITPOS mykey 1 0
(integer) 8
redis> BITPOS mykey 1 2
(integer) 16
redis> set mykey "\x00\x00\x00"
"OK"
redis> BITPOS mykey 1
(integer) -1

cards.title: BITPOS
cards.body: 查找字符串中设置或清除的第一位

cards.title: DECR
cards.code: DECR key

cards.title: DECR
cards.code:
redis> SET mykey "10"
"OK"
redis> DECR mykey
(integer) 9
redis> SET mykey "234293482390480948029348230948"
"OK"
redis> DECR mykey
ERR ERR value is not an integer or out of range

cards.title: DECRBY
cards.code: DECRBY key decrement

cards.title: DECRBY
cards.code:
redis> SET mykey "10"
"OK"
redis> DECRBY mykey 3
(integer) 7

cards.title: DECRBY
cards.body: 将键的整数值减去给定的数字

cards.title: GET
cards.code: GET key

cards.title: GET
cards.code:
redis> GET nonexisting
(nil)
redis> SET mykey "Hello"
"OK"
redis> GET mykey
"Hello"

cards.title: GETBIT
cards.code: GETBIT key offset

cards.title: GETBIT
cards.code:
redis> SETBIT mykey 7 1
(integer) 0
redis> GETBIT mykey 0
(integer) 0
redis> GETBIT mykey 7
(integer) 1
redis> GETBIT mykey 100
(integer) 0

cards.title: GETBIT
cards.body: 返回存储在 `key` 处的字符串值中 `offset` 处的位值

cards.title: GETRANGE
cards.code: GETRANGE key start end

cards.title: GETRANGE
cards.code:
redis> SET mykey "This is a string"
"OK"
redis> GETRANGE mykey 0 3
"This"
redis> GETRANGE mykey -3 -1
"ing"
redis> GETRANGE mykey 0 -1
"This is a string"
redis> GETRANGE mykey 10 100
"string"

cards.title: GETRANGE
cards.body: 获取存储在键中的字符串的子字符串

cards.title: GETSET
cards.code: GETSET key value

cards.title: GETSET
cards.code:
redis> INCR mycounter
(integer) 1
redis> GETSET mycounter "0"
"1"
redis> GET mycounter
"0"

cards.title: GETSET
cards.body: 设置键的字符串值并返回其旧值

cards.title: INCR
cards.code: INCR key

cards.title: INCR
cards.code:
redis> SET mykey "10"
"OK"
redis> INCR mykey
(integer) 11
redis> GET mykey
"11"

cards.title: MSETNX
cards.code: MSETNX key value [key value ...]

cards.title: MSETNX
cards.code:
redis> MSETNX key1 "Hello" key2 "there"
(integer) 1
redis> MSETNX key2 "new" key3 "world"
(integer) 0
redis> MGET key1 key2 key3
1) "Hello"
2) "there"
3) (nil)

cards.title: MSETNX
cards.body: 仅当不存在任何键时，将多个键设置为多个值

cards.title: INCRBYFLOAT
cards.code: INCRBYFLOAT key increment

cards.title: INCRBYFLOAT
cards.code:
redis> SET mykey 10.50
"OK"
redis> INCRBYFLOAT mykey 0.1
"10.6"
redis> INCRBYFLOAT mykey -5
"5.6"
redis> SET mykey 5.0e3
"OK"
redis> INCRBYFLOAT mykey 2.0e2
"5200"

cards.title: INCRBYFLOAT
cards.body: 将键的浮点值增加给定的数量

cards.title: MGET
cards.code: MGET key [key ...]

cards.title: MGET
cards.code:
redis> SET key1 "Hello"
"OK"
redis> SET key2 "World"
"OK"
redis> MGET key1 key2 nonexisting
1) "Hello"
2) "World"
3) (nil)

cards.title: MSET
cards.code: MSET key value [key value ...]

cards.title: MSET
cards.code:
redis> MSET key1 "Hello" key2 "World"
"OK"
redis> GET key1
"Hello"
redis> GET key2
"World"

cards.title: MSET
cards.body: 将多个键设置为多个值

cards.title: INCRBY
cards.code: INCRBY key increment

cards.title: INCRBY
cards.code:
redis> SET mykey "10"
"OK"
redis> INCRBY mykey 5
(integer) 15

cards.title: INCRBY
cards.body: 将键的整数值增加给定的数量

cards.title: PSETEX
cards.code: PSETEX key milliseconds value

cards.title: PSETEX
cards.code:
redis> PSETEX mykey 1000 "Hello"
"OK"
redis> PTTL mykey
(integer) 1000
redis> GET mykey
"Hello"

cards.title: PSETEX
cards.body: 设置键的值和过期时间(以毫秒为单位)

cards.title: SET
cards.code:
SET key value [EX seconds|PX milliseconds|KEEPTTL] [NX|XX] 
[GET]

cards.title: SET
cards.code:
redis> SET mykey "Hello"
"OK"
redis> GET mykey
"Hello"
redis> SET anotherkey "will expire in a minute" EX 60
"OK"

cards.title: SET
cards.body: 设置键的字符串值,可以理解为创建、设置、重设的作用

cards.title: SETBIT
cards.code: SETBIT key offset value

cards.title: SETBIT
cards.code:
redis> SETBIT mykey 7 1
(integer) 0
redis> SETBIT mykey 7 0
(integer) 1
redis> GET mykey
"\u0000"

cards.title: SETBIT
cards.body: 设置或清除存储在键中的字符串值中偏移量处的位

cards.title: SETEX
cards.code: SETEX key seconds value

cards.title: SETEX
cards.code:
redis> SETEX mykey 10 "Hello"
"OK"
redis> TTL mykey
(integer) 10
redis> GET mykey
"Hello"

cards.title: SETEX
cards.body: 设置密钥的值和过期时间

cards.title: SETNX
cards.code: SETNX key value

cards.title: SETNX
cards.code:
redis> SETNX mykey "Hello"
(integer) 1
redis> SETNX mykey "World"
(integer) 0
redis> GET mykey
"Hello"

cards.title: SETNX
cards.body: 设置键的值，仅当键不存在时

cards.title: SETRANGE
cards.code: SETRANGE key offset value

cards.title: SETRANGE
cards.code:
redis> SET key1 "Hello World"
"OK"
redis> SETRANGE key1 6 "Redis"
(integer) 11
redis> GET key1
"Hello Redis"

cards.title: SETRANGE
cards.body: 覆盖从指定偏移量开始的键处的字符串的一部分

cards.title: STRLEN
cards.code: STRLEN key

cards.title: STRLEN
cards.code:
redis> SET mykey "Hello world"
"OK"
redis> STRLEN mykey
(integer) 11
redis> STRLEN nonexisting
(integer) 0

cards.title: STRLEN
cards.body: 获取存储在键中的值的长度

cards.title: STRALGO
cards.code:
STRALGO LCS algo-specific-argument [algo-specific-argument 
...]

cards.title: STRALGO
cards.code:
redis> STRALGO LCS KEYS key1 key2 IDX
1) "matches"
2) 1) 1) 1) (integer) 4
         2) (integer) 7
      2) 1) (integer) 5
         2) (integer) 8
   2) 1) 1) (integer) 2
         2) (integer) 3
      2) 1) (integer) 0
         2) (integer) 1
3) "len"
4) (integer) 6

cards.title: STRALGO
cards.body: 针对字符串运行算法(目前为 LCS)

cards.title: SADD
cards.code: SADD key member [member ...]

cards.title: SADD
cards.code:
redis> SADD myset "Hello"
(integer) 1
redis> SADD myset "World"
(integer) 1
redis> SADD myset "World"
(integer) 0
redis> SMEMBERS myset
1) "Hello"
2) "World"

cards.title: SADD
cards.body: 将一个或多个成员添加到集合

cards.title: SCARD
cards.code: SCARD key

cards.title: SCARD
cards.code:

(integer) 1
redis> SADD myset "World"
(integer) 1
redis> SCARD myset
(integer) 2

cards.title: SDIFF
cards.code: SDIFF key [key ...]

cards.title: SDIFF
cards.code:

(integer) 1
redis> SADD key1 "b"
(integer) 1
redis> SADD key1 "c"
(integer) 1
redis> SADD key2 "c"
(integer) 1
redis> SADD key2 "d"
(integer) 1
redis> SADD key2 "e"
(integer) 1
redis> SDIFF key1 key2
1) "a"
2) "b"

cards.title: SDIFFSTORE
cards.code: SDIFFSTORE destination key [key ...]

cards.title: SDIFFSTORE
cards.code:
redis> SADD key1 "a"
(integer) 1
redis> SADD key1 "b"
(integer) 1
redis> SADD key1 "c"
(integer) 1
redis> SADD key2 "c"
(integer) 1
redis> SADD key2 "d"
(integer) 1
redis> SADD key2 "e"
(integer) 1
redis> SDIFFSTORE key key1 key2
(integer) 2
redis> SMEMBERS key
1) "a"
2) "b"

cards.title: SDIFFSTORE
cards.body: 减去多个集合并将结果集合存储在一个键中

cards.title: SINTER
cards.code: SINTER key [key ...]

cards.title: SINTER
cards.code:
redis> SADD key1 "a"
(integer) 1
redis> SADD key1 "b"
(integer) 1
redis> SADD key1 "c"
(integer) 1
redis> SADD key2 "c"
(integer) 1
redis> SADD key2 "d"
(integer) 1
redis> SADD key2 "e"
(integer) 1
redis> SINTER key1 key2
1) "c"

cards.title: SINTERSTORE
cards.code: SINTERSTORE destination key [key ...]

cards.title: SINTERSTORE
cards.code:
redis> SADD key1 "a"
(integer) 1
redis> SADD key1 "b"
(integer) 1
redis> SADD key1 "c"
(integer) 1
redis> SADD key2 "c"
(integer) 1
redis> SADD key2 "d"
(integer) 1
redis> SADD key2 "e"
(integer) 1
redis> SINTERSTORE key key1 key2
(integer) 1
redis> SMEMBERS key
1) "c"

cards.title: SINTERSTORE
cards.body: 将多个集合相交并将结果集合存储在一个键中

cards.title: SISMEMBER
cards.code: SISMEMBER key member

cards.title: SISMEMBER
cards.code:
redis> SADD myset "one"
(integer) 1
redis> SISMEMBER myset "one"
(integer) 1
redis> SISMEMBER myset "two"
(integer) 0

cards.title: SISMEMBER
cards.body: 确定给定值是否是集合的成员

cards.title: SMISMEMBER
cards.code: SMISMEMBER key member [member ...]

cards.title: SMISMEMBER
cards.code:
redis> SADD myset "one"
(integer) 1
redis> SADD myset "one"
(integer) 0
redis> SMISMEMBER myset "one" "notamember"
1) (integer) 1
2) (integer) 0

cards.title: SMISMEMBER
cards.body: 返回与集合的给定元素关联的成员资格

cards.title: SMEMBERS
cards.code: SMEMBERS key

cards.title: SMEMBERS
cards.code:
redis> SADD myset "Hello"
(integer) 1
redis> SADD myset "World"
(integer) 1
redis> SMEMBERS myset
1) "Hello"
2) "World"

cards.title: SMEMBERS
cards.body: 获取集合中的所有成员

cards.title: SMOVE
cards.code: SMOVE source destination member

cards.title: SMOVE
cards.code:
redis> SADD myset "one"
(integer) 1
redis> SADD myset "two"
(integer) 1
redis> SADD myotherset "three"
(integer) 1
redis> SMOVE myset myotherset "two"
(integer) 1
redis> SMEMBERS myset
1) "one"
redis> SMEMBERS myotherset
1) "two"
2) "three"

cards.title: SMOVE
cards.body: 将成员从一组移到另一组

cards.title: SPOP
cards.code: SPOP key [count]

cards.title: SPOP
cards.code:
redis> SADD myset "one"
(integer) 1
redis> SADD myset "two"
(integer) 1
redis> SADD myset "three"
(integer) 1
redis> SPOP myset
"two"
redis> SMEMBERS myset
1) "one"
2) "three"
redis> SADD myset "four"
(integer) 1
redis> SADD myset "five"
(integer) 1
redis> SPOP myset 3
1) "four"
2) "five"
3) "three"
redis> SMEMBERS myset
1) "one"

cards.title: SPOP
cards.body: 从集合中删除并返回一个或多个随机成员

cards.title: SRANDMEMBER
cards.code: SRANDMEMBER key [count]

cards.title: SRANDMEMBER
cards.code:
redis> SADD myset one two three
(integer) 3
redis> SRANDMEMBER myset
"three"
redis> SRANDMEMBER myset 2
1) "two"
2) "three"
redis> SRANDMEMBER myset -5
1) "one"
2) "two"
3) "three"
4) "three"
5) "one"

cards.title: SRANDMEMBER
cards.body: 从一组中获取一个或多个随机成员

cards.title: SREM
cards.code: SREM key member [member ...]

cards.title: SREM
cards.code:

(integer) 1
redis> SADD myset "two"
(integer) 1
redis> SADD myset "three"
(integer) 1
redis> SREM myset "one"
(integer) 1
redis> SREM myset "four"
(integer) 0
redis> SMEMBERS myset
1) "two"
2) "three"

cards.title: SREM
cards.body: 从集合中删除一个或多个成员

cards.title: SUNION
cards.code: SUNION key [key ...]

cards.code:

(integer) 1
redis> SADD key1 "b"
(integer) 1
redis> SADD key1 "c"
(integer) 1
redis> SADD key2 "c"
(integer) 1
redis> SADD key2 "d"
(integer) 1
redis> SADD key2 "e"
(integer) 1
redis> SUNION key1 key2
1) "a"
2) "c"
3) "e"
4) "b"
5) "d"

cards.code: SUNIONSTORE destination key [key ...]

cards.title: SUNIONSTORE
cards.code:
redis> SADD key1 "a"
(integer) 1
redis> SADD key1 "b"
(integer) 1
redis> SADD key1 "c"
(integer) 1
redis> SADD key2 "c"
(integer) 1
redis> SADD key2 "d"
(integer) 1

cards.body: 添加多个集合并将结果集合存储在一个键中

cards.title: 一些引用(可能有帮助)
cards.body:
:- | --
:- | --
[BRPOPLPUSH](https://redis.io/commands/brpoplpush) | 从列表中弹出一个元素，将其推入另一个列表并返回；或阻塞直到有一个可用
[BLMOVE](https://redis.io/commands/blmove)         | 从列表中弹出一个元素，将其推入另一个列表并返回；或阻塞直到有一个可用

cards.title: BLPOP
cards.code: BLPOP key [key ...] timeout

cards.title: BLPOP
cards.code:
redis> DEL list1 list2
(integer) 0
redis> RPUSH list1 a b c
(integer) 3
redis> BLPOP list1 list2 0
1) "list1"
2) "a"

cards.title: BLPOP
cards.body: 删除并获取列表中的第一个元素，或者阻塞直到有一个元素可用

cards.title: BRPOP
cards.code: BRPOP key [key ...] timeout

cards.title: BRPOP
cards.code:
redis> DEL list1 list2
(integer) 0
redis> RPUSH list1 a b c
(integer) 3
redis> BRPOP list1 list2 0
1) "list1"
2) "c"

cards.title: BRPOP
cards.body: 删除并获取列表中的最后一个元素，或者阻塞直到有一个可用

cards.title: LINDEX
cards.code: LINDEX key index

cards.title: LINDEX
cards.code:
redis> LPUSH mylist "World"
(integer) 1
redis> LPUSH mylist "Hello"
(integer) 2
redis> LINDEX mylist 0
"Hello"
redis> LINDEX mylist -1
"World"
redis> LINDEX mylist 3
(nil)

cards.title: LINDEX
cards.body: 通过索引从列表中获取元素

cards.title: LINSERT
cards.code: LINSERT key BEFORE|AFTER pivot element

cards.title: LINSERT
cards.code:
redis> RPUSH mylist "Hello"
(integer) 1
redis> RPUSH mylist "World"
(integer) 2
redis> LINSERT mylist BEFORE "World" "There"
(integer) 3
redis> LRANGE mylist 0 -1
1) "Hello"
2) "There"
3) "World"

cards.title: LINSERT
cards.body: 在列表中的另一个元素之前或之后插入一个元素

cards.title: LLEN
cards.code: LLEN key

cards.title: LLEN
cards.code:
redis> LPUSH mylist "World"
(integer) 1
redis> LPUSH mylist "Hello"
(integer) 2
redis> LLEN mylist
(integer) 2

cards.title: LPOP
cards.code: LPOP key [count]

cards.title: LPOP
cards.code:
redis> RPUSH mylist "one"
(integer) 1
redis> RPUSH mylist "two"
(integer) 2
redis> RPUSH mylist "three"
(integer) 3
redis> LPOP mylist
"one"
redis> LRANGE mylist 0 -1
1) "two"
2) "three"

cards.title: LPOP
cards.body: 删除并获取列表中的第一个元素

cards.title: LPOS
cards.code: LPOS key element [RANK rank] [COUNT num-matches] [MAXLEN len]

cards.title: LPOS
cards.code:
redis> RPUSH mylist a b c d 1 2 3 4 3 3 3
(integer) 11
redis> LPOS mylist 3
(integer) 6
redis> LPOS mylist 3 COUNT 0 RANK 2
1) (integer) 8
2) (integer) 9
3) (integer) 10

cards.title: LPOS
cards.body: 返回列表中匹配元素的索引

cards.title: LPUSH
cards.code: LPUSH key element [element ...]

cards.title: LPUSH
cards.code:
redis> LPUSH mylist "world"
(integer) 1
redis> LPUSH mylist "hello"
(integer) 2
redis> LRANGE mylist 0 -1
1) "hello"
2) "world"

cards.title: LPUSH
cards.body: 将一个或多个元素添加到列表中

cards.title: LPUSHX
cards.code: LPUSHX key element [element ...]

cards.title: LPUSHX
cards.code:
redis> LPUSH mylist "World"
(integer) 1
redis> LPUSHX mylist "Hello"
(integer) 2
redis> LPUSHX myotherlist "Hello"
(integer) 0

1) "Hello"
2) "World"

cards.title: LRANGE
cards.code: LRANGE key start stop

cards.title: LRANGE
cards.code:

(integer) 1
redis> RPUSH mylist "two"
(integer) 2
redis> RPUSH mylist "three"

1) "one"
2) "two"

2) "two"
3) "three"

(empty list or set)

cards.code:

(integer) 1

cards.title: LMOVE
cards.code: LMOVE source destination LEFT|RIGHT LEFT|RIGHT

cards.code:

redis> RPUSH mylist "two"

(nil)

cards.title: GEODIST
cards.body: 返回地理空间索引的两个成员之间的距离

cards.title: GEORADIUS
cards.code:
GEORADIUS key longitude latitude radius m|km|ft|mi [WITHCOORD] [WITHDIST] [WITHHASH] [COUNT 
count] [ASC|DESC] [STORE key] [STOREDIST key]

cards.title: GEORADIUS
cards.body: 查询表示地理空间索引的排序集，以获取与某个点的给定最大距离匹配的成员

cards.title: GEORADIUSBYMEMBER
cards.code:
GEORADIUSBYMEMBER key member radius m|km|ft|mi [WITHCOORD] [WITHDIST] [WITHHASH] [COUNT count] 
[ASC|DESC] [STORE key] [STOREDIST key]

cards.title: GEORADIUSBYMEMBER
cards.code:
redis> GEOADD Sicily 13.583333 37.316667 "Agrigento"
(integer) 1
redis> GEOADD Sicily 13.361389 38.115556 "Palermo" 15.087269 37.502669 "Catania"
(integer) 2
redis> GEORADIUSBYMEMBER Sicily Agrigento 100 km
1) "Agrigento"
2) "Palermo"

cards.title: GEORADIUSBYMEMBER
cards.body: 查询表示地理空间索引的排序集，以获取与成员的给定最大距离相匹配的成员

cards.title: GEOSEARCH
cards.code:
GEOSEARCH key [FROMMEMBER member] [FROMLONLAT longitude latitude] [BYRADIUS radius m|km|ft|mi] 
[BYBOX width height m|km|ft|mi] [ASC|DESC] [COUNT count] [WITHCOORD] [WITHDIST] [WITHHASH]

cards.title: GEOSEARCH
cards.code:
redis> GEOADD Sicily 13.361389 38.115556 "Palermo" 15.087269 37.502669 "Catania"
(integer) 2
redis> GEOADD Sicily 12.758489 38.788135 "edge1"   17.241510 38.788135 "edge2"
(integer) 2
redis> GEOSEARCH Sicily FROMLONLAT 15 37 BYRADIUS 200 km ASC
1) "Catania"
2) "Palermo"
redis> GEOSEARCH Sicily FROMLONLAT 15 37 BYBOX 400 400 km ASC
1) "Catania"
2) "Palermo"
3) "edge2"
4) "edge1"

cards.title: GEOSEARCH
cards.body: 查询表示地理空间索引的排序集，以获取框或圆区域内的成员。

cards.title: 一些引用(可能有帮助)
cards.body:
:- | --
:- | --
[GEOSEARCHSTORE](https://redis.io/commands/geosearchstore) | 查询表示地理空间索引的排序集以获取框或圆区域内的成员，并将结果存储在另一个键中
<!--rehype:className=style-list-->

cards.title: PFADD
cards.code: PFADD key element [element ...]

cards.title: PFADD
cards.code:
redis> PFADD hll a b c d e f g
(integer) 1
redis> PFCOUNT hll
(integer) 7

cards.title: PFADD
cards.body: 将指定的元素添加到指定的HyperLogLog。

cards.title: PFCOUNT
cards.code: PFCOUNT key [key ...]

cards.title: PFCOUNT
cards.code:
redis> PFADD hll foo bar zap
(integer) 1
redis> PFADD hll zap zap zap
(integer) 0
redis> PFADD hll foo bar
(integer) 0
redis> PFCOUNT hll
(integer) 3
redis> PFADD some-other-hll 1 2 3
(integer) 1
redis> PFCOUNT hll some-other-hll
(integer) 6

cards.title: PFCOUNT
cards.body: 返回HyperLogLog在键处观察到的集合的近似基数。

cards.title: PFMERGE
cards.code: PFMERGE destkey sourcekey [sourcekey ...]

cards.title: PFMERGE
cards.code:
redis> PFADD hll1 foo bar zap a
(integer) 1
redis> PFADD hll2 a b c foo
(integer) 1
redis> PFMERGE hll3 hll1 hll2
"OK"
redis> PFCOUNT hll3
(integer) 6

cards.title: PFMERGE
cards.body: 将N个不同的HyperLogLogs合并成一个。

cards.title: 一些引用(可能有帮助)
cards.body:
:- | --
:- | --
[XINFO](https://redis.io/commands/xinfo)           | 获取有关流和消费者组的信息
[XDEL](https://redis.io/commands/xdel)             | 从流中删除指定的条目。返回实际删除的项目数，如果某些 ID 不存在，则可能与传递的 ID 数不同
[XREAD](https://redis.io/commands/xread)           | 返回多个流中从未见过的元素，其 ID 大于调用者为每个流报告的 ID
[XGROUP](https://redis.io/commands/xgroup)         | 创建、销毁和管理消费者组
[XREADGROUP](https://redis.io/commands/xreadgroup) | 使用消费者组从流中返回新条目，或访问给定消费者的待处理条目的历史记录
[XCLAIM](https://redis.io/commands/xclaim)         | 更改(或获取)消费者组中消息的所有权，就好像消息已传递给指定的消费者一样
[XPENDING](https://redis.io/commands/xpending)     | 从流消费者组待定条目列表中返回信息和条目，这些信息是已获取但从未确认的消息
<!--rehype:className=style-list-->

cards.title: XADD
cards.code: XADD key [MAXLEN [=|~] length] [NOMKSTREAM] *|ID field value [field value ...]

cards.title: XADD
cards.code:
redis> XADD mystream * name Sara surname OConnor
"1609040574632-0"
redis> XADD mystream * field1 value1 field2 value2 field3 value3
"1609040574632-1"
redis> XLEN mystream
(integer) 2
redis> XRANGE mystream - +
1) 1) "1609040574632-0"
   2) 1) "name"
      2) "Sara"
      3) "surname"
      4) "OConnor"
2) 1) "1609040574632-1"
   2) 1) "field1"
      2) "value1"
      3) "field2"
      4) "value2"
      5) "field3"
      6) "value3"

cards.title: XTRIM
cards.code: XTRIM key MAXLEN [=|~] length

cards.title: XTRIM
cards.code:
redis> XADD mystream * field1 A field2 B field3 C field4 D
"1609040575750-0"
redis> XTRIM mystream MAXLEN 2
(integer) 0
redis> XRANGE mystream - +
1) 1) "1609040575750-0"
   2) 1) "field1"
      2) "A"
      3) "field2"
      4) "B"
      5) "field3"
      6) "C"
      7) "field4"
      8) "D"

cards.title: XTRIM
cards.body: 将流修剪为(大约如果传递了“~”)特定大小

cards.title: XRANGE
cards.code: XRANGE key start end [COUNT count]

cards.title: XRANGE
cards.code:
redis> XADD writers * name Virginia surname Woolf
"1609040578002-0"
redis> XADD writers * name Jane surname Austen
"1609040578002-1"
redis> XADD writers * name Toni surname Morrison
"1609040578003-0"
redis> XADD writers * name Agatha surname Christie
"1609040578003-1"
redis> XADD writers * name Ngozi surname Adichie
"1609040578003-2"
redis> XLEN writers
(integer) 5
redis> XRANGE writers - + COUNT 2
1) 1) "1609040578002-0"
   2) 1) "name"
      2) "Virginia"
      3) "surname"
      4) "Woolf"
2) 1) "1609040578002-1"
   2) 1) "name"
      2) "Jane"
      3) "surname"
      4) "Austen"

cards.title: XRANGE
cards.body: 返回流中的一系列元素，其 ID 与指定的 ID 间隔相匹配

cards.title: XREVRANGE
cards.code: XREVRANGE key end start [COUNT count]

cards.title: XREVRANGE
cards.code:
redis> XADD writers * name Virginia surname Woolf
"1609040579130-0"
redis> XADD writers * name Jane surname Austen
"1609040579130-1"
redis> XADD writers * name Toni surname Morrison
"1609040579130-2"
redis> XADD writers * name Agatha surname Christie
"1609040579131-0"
redis> XADD writers * name Ngozi surname Adichie
"1609040579131-1"
redis> XLEN writers
(integer) 5
redis> XREVRANGE writers + - COUNT 1
1) 1) "1609040579131-1"
   2) 1) "name"
      2) "Ngozi"
      3) "surname"
      4) "Adichie"

cards.title: XREVRANGE
cards.body: 返回流中的一系列元素，ID 与指定的 ID 间隔相匹配，与 XRANGE 相比，顺序相反(从大到小的 ID)

cards.title: XLEN
cards.code: XLEN key

cards.title: XLEN
cards.code:
redis> XADD mystream * item 1
"1609040580250-0"
redis> XADD mystream * item 2
"1609040580250-1"
redis> XADD mystream * item 3
"1609040580251-0"
redis> XLEN mystream
(integer) 3

cards.title: XACK
cards.code: XACK key group ID [ID ...]

cards.title: XACK
cards.code:
redis> XACK mystream mygroup 1526569495631-0
ERR Unknown or disabled command 'XACK'

cards.title: XACK
cards.body: 将待处理消息标记为已正确处理，有效地将其从消费者组的待处理条目列表中删除，该命令的返回值是成功确认的消息数，即我们实际能够在 `PEL` 中解析的 `ID`

cards.title: 节点、集群
cards.body:
:- | --
:- | --
| [CLUSTER ADDSLOTS](https://redis.io/commands/cluster-addslots)                           | 为接收节点分配新的哈希槽 |
| [CLUSTER BUMPEPOCH](https://redis.io/commands/cluster-bumpepoch)                          | 提前集群配置纪元 |
| [CLUSTER COUNT-FAILURE-REPORTS](https://redis.io/commands/cluster-count-failure-reports) | 返回给定节点的活动故障报告数 |
| [CLUSTER COUNTKEYSINSLOT](https://redis.io/commands/cluster-countkeysinslot)             | 返回指定哈希槽中本地键的个数 |
| [CLUSTER DELSLOTS](https://redis.io/commands/cluster-delslots)                           | 在接收节点中将哈希槽设置为未绑定 |
| [CLUSTER FAILOVER](https://redis.io/commands/cluster-failover)                           | 强制副本对其主副本执行手动故障转移 |
| [CLUSTER FLUSHSLOTS](https://redis.io/commands/cluster-flushslots)                        | 删除节点自身的slot信息 |
| [CLUSTER FORGET](https://redis.io/commands/cluster-forget)                               | 从节点表中删除一个节点 |
| [CLUSTER GETKEYSINSLOT](https://redis.io/commands/cluster-getkeysinslot)                 | 返回指定哈希槽中的本地键名 |
| [CLUSTER INFO](https://redis.io/commands/cluster-info)                                    | 提供有关 Redis 集群节点状态的信息 |
| [CLUSTER KEYSLOT](https://redis.io/commands/cluster-keyslot)                             | 返回指定键的哈希槽 |
| [CLUSTER MEET](https://redis.io/commands/cluster-meet)                                   | 强制节点集群与另一个节点握手 |
| [CLUSTER MYID](https://redis.io/commands/cluster-myid)                                    | 返回节点id |
| [CLUSTER NODES](https://redis.io/commands/cluster-nodes)                                  | 获取节点的集群配置 |
| [CLUSTER REPLICATE](https://redis.io/commands/cluster-replicate)                         | 将节点重新配置为指定主节点的副本 |
| [CLUSTER RESET](https://redis.io/commands/cluster-reset)                                 | 重置 Redis 集群节点 |
| [CLUSTER SAVECONFIG](https://redis.io/commands/cluster-saveconfig)                        | 强制节点将集群状态保存在磁盘上 |
| [CLUSTER SET-CONFIG-EPOCH](https://redis.io/commands/cluster-set-config-epoch)           | 在新节点中设置配置纪元 |
| [CLUSTER SETSLOT](https://redis.io/commands/cluster-setslot)                             | 将哈希槽绑定到特定节点 |
| [CLUSTER SLAVES](https://redis.io/commands/cluster-slaves)                               | 列出指定主节点的副本节点 |
| [CLUSTER REPLICAS](https://redis.io/commands/cluster-replicas)                           | 列出指定主节点的副本节点 |
| [CLUSTER SLOTS](https://redis.io/commands/cluster-slots)                                  | 获取集群插槽数组到节点映射 |
| [READONLY](https://redis.io/commands/readonly)                                            | 为到集群副本节点的连接启用读取查询 |
| [READWRITE](https://redis.io/commands/readwrite)                                          | 禁用对集群副本节点连接的读取查询 |

cards.title: 交易
cards.body:
:- | --
:- | --
[DISCARD](https://redis.io/commands/discard) | 丢弃 MULTI 之后发出的所有命令
[EXEC](https://redis.io/commands/exec)       | 执行 MULTI 之后发出的所有命令
[MULTI](https://redis.io/commands/multi)     | 标记事务块的开始
[UNWATCH](https://redis.io/commands/unwatch) | 忘记所有监视的键
[WATCH](https://redis.io/commands/watch)    | 观察给定的键以确定MULTI/EXEC块的执行

cards.title: 脚本
cards.body:
:- | --
:- | --
[EVAL](https://redis.io/commands/eval)                   | 执行 Lua 脚本服务器端
[EVALSHA](https://redis.io/commands/evalsha)             | 执行 Lua 脚本服务器端
[SCRIPT DEBUG](https://redis.io/commands/script-debug)   | 为执行的脚本设置调试模式
[SCRIPT EXISTS](https://redis.io/commands/script-exists) | 检查脚本缓存中是否存在脚本
[SCRIPT FLUSH](https://redis.io/commands/script-flush)    | 从脚本缓存中删除所有脚本
[SCRIPT KILL](https://redis.io/commands/script-kill)      | 终止当前正在执行的脚本
[SCRIPT LOAD](https://redis.io/commands/script-load)     | 将指定的 Lua 脚本加载到脚本缓存中

cards.title: 发布操作
cards.body:
:- | --
:- | --
[PSUBSCRIBE](https://redis.io/commands/psubscribe)     | 侦听发布到与给定模式匹配的频道的消息
[PUBSUB](https://redis.io/commands/pubsub)             | 检查 Pub/Sub 子系统的状态
[PUBLISH](https://redis.io/commands/publish)           | 向频道发布消息
[PUNSUBSCRIBE](https://redis.io/commands/punsubscribe) | 停止监听发布到与给定模式匹配的频道的消息
[SUBSCRIBE](https://redis.io/commands/subscribe)       | 收听发布到给定频道的消息
[UNSUBSCRIBE](https://redis.io/commands/unsubscribe)   | 停止收听发布到给定频道的消息
